oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - New Zealand - 1972 - part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in New Zealand. Featuring Tex Ritter (host), Freddy Weller (performer), and Connie Smith (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Freddy Weller; Connie Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:11) The Promised Land (Freddy Weller) (incomplete) -- (02:30) Freddy Weller talks about Merle Haggard and introduces the next tune -- (02:37) Okie From Muskogee (Freddy Weller) -- (04:59) Weller thanks Tom T. Hall's band and introduces Bob Warford and the next tune -- (05:30) Games People Play (Freddy Weller, Paul Warford guitar) -- (08:54) Tex Ritter introduces Connie Smith -- (10:05) Just One Time (Connie Smith) -- (12:32) I Never Stopped Loving You (Connie Smith) -- (15:14) Connie Smith introduces the next tune -- (15:23) Louisiana Man (Connie Smith) -- (18:15) Once A Day, Everyday, All Day Long (Connie Smith) -- (20:43) Smith thanks the audience and talks about the people of New Zealand -- Smith talks about her experiences with God -- (22:07) How Great Thou Art (Connie Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Association (U.S.); Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Weller, Freddy, 1947-; Smith, Connie, 1941-;
